thread.title: Lexus, Porsche, Toyota, Buick: America's most dependable brands
thread.title_full: Lexus, Porsche, Toyota, Buick: America's most dependable brands

author: Richard Read (feedback@highgearmedia.com)
title: Lexus, Porsche, Toyota, Buick: America's most dependable brands
text: In the market for a car--maybe one that's a little gently used? You're in luck: this week, J.D. Power published its 2017 Vehicle Dependability Study, showing which brands are likely to cause the fewest headaches down the road. The Dependability Study is a bit like Power's equally popular Initial Quality Study, which is typically issued in June...
